notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was supported by the German Federal Ministry of Health through the support of the WHO Collaborating Centre for Arboviruses and Hemorrhagic Fever Viruses at the Bernhard Nocht Institute for Tropical Medicine (agreement ZMV I1-2517WHO005), the Global Health Protection Program (agreements ZMV I1-2517GHP-704 and ZMV I1-2519GHP-704), the German Research Foundation (DFG) to Nâ€™F.M. and E.F.-C. (FI 1781/2-1) and to S.G. (GU 883/4-1 and GU 883/5-1) and PANDORA-ID-NET from the EDCTP Reg/(RIA2016E-1609) to S.G. and E.F.-C.
